description: Filthy punk Sky Donovan is back in jail...about to be interviewed byOfficer Michael Brandon. Watching this scene makes you wonder whyguys like Sky are not locked up forever. They are dangerous,disgusting, foul-mouthed shits who try to charm their way thru life witha nice smile and a pack of lies. Michael Brandon sees through it all,and before you know it Sky Donovan is on the floor, handcuffed to atable, with a police baton up his ass. In an amazing fuck scene thathelped Michael win his second GAYVN Performer of the Yearaward, Sky's ass is literally split wide open under the probing power ofBrandon's world famous 11 inch cock. Sky moans for help, but Brandon plows on until the bastard punk collapses in hisown squalor. The thug, the cop and the viewers all get what they deserve!
title: Cops Gone Bad
